package.name: acdk_sql_odbc
package.title: ACDK SQL ODBC (acdk_sql_odbc)
package.shortdescription: With acdk_sql_odbc, you can access all databases providing the ODBC interface.
package.copyright: Copyright © 2000 - 2005 by Roger Rene Kommer, artefaktur
package.description:
The acdk_sql_odbc library implements the interfaces of %ref[acdk_sql, acdk_sql] to access databases via the ODBC interface.
Following Databases should be supported:
Windows all ODBC-Databases, including MS SQL 2000, MS Access, PostgreSQL, Oracle, Informix.
On Linux/Solaris platform: Oracle 8, mySQL, MiniSQL, PostgreSQL, Text-Files.
acdk_sql_odbc support the %ref[basic SQL Type, acdk_sql_man_types] the %ref[standard queries and operations, acdk_sql_man_basics], %ref[prepared statements, acdk_sql_man_prep] invokation of %ref[stored procedures, acdk_sql_man_callable] and %ref[database metainfo, acdk_sql_man_dbinfo].
Please refer to %ref[acdk_sql_man_inst] how to use acdk_sql_odbc on Windows and Unix platforms.

notes.pre:
=========================================================== Bugs - Limitations.
Not all SQL-types are supported, but the basic ones.
